type: Tutorial Step - Are We Up to Date..?

definition.text: By now, all processes should be at 100%. We need the data to be ready so that we can go and do some work on the charts!

paragraphs.text: Look around and see if all processes are at 100%. If all of them are, then stop the data mining!
Wait until all processes reach the 100% mark before continuing!
In the next step we are going to the charts to check the Bollinger Bands so that we can discuss the trading idea we will test!
